title: Update the Doctor Suites section/page

requirements.text: Implement a dedicated "Doctor Suites" page (using the existing `frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx`) with polished, hospital-quality layout and English user-facing text. The page must clearly present doctor suites information in a structured way (e.g., suite/department name, brief description, hours/availability, and a clear call-to-action to book an appointment or contact the clinic).
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/pages/DoctorsPage.tsx` is no longer empty and renders a complete "Doctor Suites" page.
All user-facing text on the page is in English.
The page uses existing design patterns/components (e.g., `PageHero`, `Section`, `Card`, `Button`) to match the siteâ€™s current look and feel.
The page includes at least one CTA that routes to an existing internal page (e.g., /appointments or /contact).
Layout is responsive (mobile/tablet/desktop) and does not overflow horizontally.

requirements.text: Add routing and navigation for the "Doctor Suites" page so users can reach it from the main header navigation.
acceptanceCriteria: A new route is added in `frontend/src/App.tsx` for the Doctor Suites page (path and label are consistent across the app).
`frontend/src/components/layout/SiteHeader.tsx` includes a new navigation link labeled "Doctor Suites" that navigates to the new route.
The active route styling works consistently with other nav links on both desktop and mobile menus.

requirements.text: Update SEO metadata and sitemap to include the Doctor Suites route.
acceptanceCriteria: `frontend/src/config/seo.ts` includes a new `ROUTE_SEO` entry for the Doctor Suites path with an appropriate English title and description.
`frontend/public/sitemap.xml` includes the Doctor Suites URL under the existing `https://mahalaxmi-health-care.icp.page` domain.
After the change, navigating to the Doctor Suites page updates the document title and meta description consistently with other routes (via the existing SEO manager).

constraints: Do not edit files under `frontend/src/components/ui` (compose existing shadcn components instead).
Do not modify any files listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT (e.g., `frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts`, `frontend/src/main.tsx`).
Keep all backend logic in a single Motoko actor; no backend changes are required for this request unless strictly necessary.
nonGoals: Do not implement Google indexing/Search Console verification as part of this change.
Do not add third-party integrations or external databases.
Do not change the meaning of existing site content outside of the new/updated Doctor Suites page.
